Key Components

This section provides an overview of the key components in the MailQ codebase.

  • API (mailq/api.py): The entry point for email classification.
  • Memory Classifier (mailq/memory_classifier.py): The core logic for classifying emails.
  • Rules Engine (mailq/rules_engine.py): Contains predefined rules for email classification.
  • Vertex Gemini Classifier (mailq/vertex_gemini_classifier.py): AI model for advanced classification.
  • Mapper (mailq/mapper.py): Translates classification results into Gmail labels.
  • Category Manager (mailq/category_manager.py): Manages user-specific email categories.

Component Interactions

Understanding how components interact is crucial for maintaining and extending the system.

  • The API receives emails and triggers the classification process.
  • The Memory Classifier uses the Rules Engine and AI for classification.
  • Classification results are mapped to Gmail labels by the Mapper.
